contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of February, 2005, upon consideration of the Application for Review, pursuant to 42 Pa.C.S. § 722 and Pa.R.A.P. 3331(a), it is hereby ordered that the Application for Review is GRANTED and the matter is remanded for supplementation of the record, to the extent deemed necessary.
It is further noted that the trial judge may limit any hearings if such hearings would merely duplicate hearings held pursuant to this Court’s order of November 12, 2004 in the related matter of 119 MM 2004.
Justice CASTILLE files a Dissenting Statement in which Justice EAKIN joins.
